Other%20Typealiases.html#/s:15XCMetricsC.name: WarningBuild

Other%20Typealiases.html#/s:15XCMetricsC.name: FunctionBuild

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: buildDir
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: The value of the Xcode $BUILD_DIR environment variable provided as argument. If not provided directly, XCMetrics will try to fetch it from the environment.

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: name
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: The name of the current project provided as argument.

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: timeout
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: The timeout to wait for the Xcode’s log to appear provided as argument. Default value is 5 seconds.

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: serviceURL
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: The URL of the service where to send metrics to provided as argument. In debug builds, this argument can be ommitted and the default local

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: isCI
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: If the metrics collected are coming from CI or not provided as argument. Default value is false.

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: skipNotes
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: If the Notes found in log should be skipped. Useful when there are thousands of notes to

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: authorizationKey
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: An optional authorization/token header key to be included in the upload request. Must be used in conjunction with authorizationValue.

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: authorizationValue
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: An optional authorization/token header value to be included in the upload request. Must be used in conjunction with authorizationKey.

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: truncLargeIssues
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: If an individual task have more than a 100 issues (Warnings, Notes and/or Errors) this flag will instruct the parser to

Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.name: run(with:)
Structs/XCMetrics.html#/s:15XCMetricsCli.abstract: Runs XCMetrics with the provided configuration containing the optional custom plugins to be executed.

Structs/XCMetricsPlugin.html#/s:15XCMetr.name: PluginBody
Structs/XCMetricsPlugin.html#/s:15XCMetr.abstract: The body implementation of a plugin which takes a dictionary of the environment variable provided to it and

Structs/MetricsUploadRequest.html#/s:15X.name: fileURL
Structs/MetricsUploadRequest.html#/s:15X.abstract: URL either pointing to an xcactivitylog or to an encoded request stored on disk which failed to upload previously.

Structs/MetricsUploadRequest.html#/s:15X.name: request
Structs/MetricsUploadRequest.html#/s:15X.abstract: A request object that will be populated with data.

Structs/MetricsUploadRequest.html.name: MetricsUploadRequest
Structs/MetricsUploadRequest.html.abstract: Describes the upload request managed by XCMetrics. This could either be a previously failed to upload request or a

Structs/XCMetricsPlugin.html.name: XCMetricsPlugin
Structs/XCMetricsPlugin.html.abstract: A plugin executed by XCMetrics that collects custom metrics.

Structs/XCMetrics.html.name: XCMetrics
Structs/XCMetrics.html.abstract: The entry point for XCMetrics that parses all argument if executed standalone or by another package that depends on it.

Protocols/StatisticsRepository.html#/s:1.name: getDayBuildTimes(from:to:using:)
Protocols/StatisticsRepository.html#/s:1.abstract: Fetches build times for a date range, sorted by date

Protocols/StatisticsRepository.html#/s:1.name: getBuildTime(day:using:)
Protocols/StatisticsRepository.html#/s:1.abstract: Calculates and returns build time information for a given day

Protocols/StatisticsRepository.html#/s:1.name: createDayBuildTime(day:using:)
Protocols/StatisticsRepository.html#/s:1.abstract: Calculates and stores build time information for a given day

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS15XCMetricsC.abstract: Returns a String with the first match of the regular expression
